___ layout: post title: CRAFT BREWED!!!!! author: Whit Morriss ___ Firas, Matt, and I had a good hang and hack at Craft Brewed. Learned more about github pages, talked about spine for pyramid, did some speccing for keg app. Craft Brewed is an awesome location. It's quiet and allows for folks to bring in food. I think we should do a potluck there every first wednesday of the month, and do a second hacknight the third wednesday at the taproom.
